publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5407 John Lamont: Hawick Learning Community—That the Parliament congratulates the Hawick Learning Community on its Vision 2014 project, which was recently exhibited in the Scottish Parliament; notes that the project was presented by pupils from Stirches Primary School, Newcastleton Primary School, Denholm Primary School, Hobkirk Primary School, Drumlanrig Primary School, Wilton Primary School, Trinity Primary School, St Margaret’s Primary School, Burnfoot Community School and Hawick High School; recognises the hard work that went into the preparation of the project by both pupils and staff and the enthusiasm with which it was presented, and wishes success to all schools involved as they work toward the celebration year of 2014.
